entry.title: $2400 // 1 Bed ":" / 1 Bath at 439 Knickerbocker Ave
entry.content:
1 Bed / 1 Bath at 439 Knickerbocker Ave - Unit: 2D in Bushwick, Brooklyn. Small Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Knickerbocker Av, DeKalb Av. These newly renovated 1 bedrooms are stellar! Huge open concept living room and modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, high ceilings, sunny windows throughout, spacious bedrooms with ample closet space, the works! Steps away from the Knickerbocker Avenue M train, and walkable to the Myrtle-Wyckoff Avenue L & M, along with lots of retail, coffee shops, bars, restaurants, etc. One Month Free and No Fee!

Move in Costs: First and Security
Credit: Healthy
Available:Now
Fee: No Fee

Contact Me directly at show contact info to schedule an appointment


AMENITIES
Central A/C
High Ceilings
Hardwood Floors

Eat In Kitchen

entry.title: $2399 // SPACIOUS 2br in Heart of Bushwick by JMZ!
entry.content:
Bright and sunny 2 bedroom apartment with huge living room.

Large renovated kitchen with plenty of storage and counter space. Modern bathroom with classic styling and extra storage. Queen sized bedrooms with windows.

Great location near the Morgan L and JMZ trains. Right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Archie's, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse. Pets are welcome!

NO BROKER FEE!
Call, text, or email Dave to Schedule a viewing!
